data.eml:eml: Six new eriophyoid mites (Acari: Eriophyoidea) associated with Ficus spp. (Moraceae) from China

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Wang, Guoquan, Wei, Suigai, Yang, Ding (2009): Six new eriophyoid mites (Acari: Eriophyoidea) associated with Ficus spp. (Moraceae) from China. Zootaxa 2201: 49-62, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.189637
